==Overview==

The idea is to make that impossibly small radio that fits inside your ear. Here is a breakdown of how it could work:

*Your cell phone is the transmitter/receiver. This sits in your pocket connected to whomever you wish to talk to.
*The phone connects via bluetooth or a headset wire to an induction transmitter that is worn around your neck.
*The necklace is actually a wire loop that acts as an antenna coil.
*In your ear is an earpiece with an induction receiver than can pick up the transmission from the transmitter.
*The microphone you speak into is clipped to the inside of your shirt.


==Receiver==
*http://www.techlib.com/electronics/induction.html
**Contains info about building an induction receiver.
**Hearing aids contain a telecoil that works as an induction receiver.
